Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A $(this.appearance:breasts) left breast covered in $(this.appearance:fur) $(this.appearance:fur-color) fur.
{? equal | $(this.appearance:cheekshape) | ordinary |A left cheek.|A left $(this.appearance:cheekshape) cheek.}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:earshape) | ordinary |A left ear.|A left $(this.appearance:earshape) ear.}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:earshape) | ordinary |A left earlobe.|A left $(this.appearance:earshape) earlobe.}
{? equal | $(this.appearance:eyebrowshape) | ordinary |A left eyebrow.|A left $(this.appearance:eyebrowshape) eyebrow.}
Ordinary eyelashes over a left eye.
A set of five left fingernails.
A set of left fingers, with nails at the ends.
{? equal | $(this.appearance:hands) | ordinary |A left hand.|A $(this.appearance:hands) left talon.}
A left index finger, with a nail at the end.
A fingernail, at the end of a left index finger.
A normal human's left index fingertip.
A left middle finger, with a nail at the end.
A fingernail, at the end of a left middle finger.
A normal human's left middle fingertip.
The little finger on a left hand, with a nail at the end.
A fingernail, at the end of a left pinky finger.
A normal human's left pinky fingertip.
A pupil of the left eye.
A left ring finger, with a nail at the end.
A fingernail, at the end of a left ring finger.
A normal human's left ring fingertip.
The triangular bone across the upper left back of the body, connected to the collarbone.
The left side, between the left ribs and the left waist.
The sole of a left foot.
A left temple, on the side of the forehead.
A fingernail, at the end of a left thumb finger.
